= Parts Registry DAS  =

http://partsregistry.org/DAS_-_Distributed_Annotation_System

= How to use the Parts Registry DAS through the Biological Web Services Proxy =

To use Parts Registry DAS through the proxy the following parameters should be added to the proxy URL:

*bwsp_service* = PartsRegistry_DAS

Name of the service

*bwsp_response_format* = row | json

Response format, could be the row xml format provided by the iHOP web service or JSON. 

*bwsp_callback* = callback name

If provided the response of the server is a JSONP function 

*bwsp_url* = Parts Registry DAS url

Parts Registry DAS url. See the following examples

= Examples =

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=partsRegistry_das&bwsp_response_format=json&bwsp_url=http://partsregistry.org/das/dsn/
